text: Charli Grace D'Amelio (born May 1, 2004) is an American social media personality and dancer. She is the first person to earn both 50 million followers and 100 million followers on TikTok. She was the second-highest earning TikTok personality in 2019 according to Forbes. She is sometimes called TikTok's biggest star. == Career == She and her sister Dixie, worked with UNICEF, speaking out against online bullying and about the troubles of finding fame on TikTok. On 21 April, 2020, Charil became the first person to reach 50 million followers in tiktok. On 13 November, 2020, Charil became the first person to reach 100 million followers in tiktok. In 2021, Charli won the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice award for Female Social Star. D'Amelio's channel began on TikTok in the summer of 2019, who uploaded videos of her dancing. D'Amelio starred in her own reality television series named The D'Amelio Show. == Personal life == Her father Marc D'Amelio is a politician. Her mother is Heidi D'Amelio. Her sister is Dixie D'Amelio. == References == == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:People from Norwalk, Connecticut Category:Living people Category:2004 births Category:American TikTokers Category:American YouTubers Category:American dancers
title: Charli D'Amelio
